captions.text:
>>WE'VE BEEN WAITING TO GO ON FOR OVER 20
MINUTES!
THE GAME WENT INTO TRIPLE OVER TIME.
THEY'RE EATING UP OUR TIME SLOT.
OKAY, THEY'RE CUTTING BACK TO US.
GET THROUGH THE WHOLE BROADCAST IN FIVE MINUTES.

>>LIVE, THIS IS CHANNEL 8 NEWS AT 10:00 WITH
JOHN HARPER
>>GOOD EVENING AND WELCOME TO WORLD NEWS AT 10,

OUR TOP STORY TONIGHT, FOREIGN AID TO THE
MIDDLE EAST
HAS SOME PEOPLE UP IN ARMS.
WE GO NOW TO OUT CORRESPONDENT PHILLIP CASTLE,
WHO IS LIVE ON THE SCENE.
PHILLIP, THINGS SEEMS TO BE RATHER
>>RECENT DEVELOPMENTS IN CLEAN ENERGY HAVE SOME
PEOPLE ASKING QUESTIONS, BUT MORE ON THAT
LATER IN THE PROGRAM, LET'S FIRST CHECK
>>WE NOW GO BACK TO OUR STORY ON CLEAN ENERGY.
WE GO NOW TO LOCAL EXPERT DR. SIMON GUNTHER.
THANKS FOR JOINING US DOCTOR- LET'S GET RIGHT TO IT.

SOLAR POWER CAN RUN CARS, HOMES, EVEN ENTIRE
CITIES,

AND I UNDERSTAND THE TECHNOLOGY HAS BEEN AROUND
FOR SOME TIME?
SO WHY ARE WE STILL DEPENDENT ON GAS AND OIL?
>>AND NOW FOR A STORY ABOUT A NON-PROFIT ANIMAL
>>WE NOW SHARE A SPECIAL REPORT FROM DIANE DUBANOWSKI WHO HAS
SPEND THE LAST SIX MONTHS PREPARING AN EXHAUSTIVE
>>AND NOW FOR OUR WEEKLY SEGMENT REGARDING
THE STATE OF THE NATION, WE HAVE,
AS ALWAYS, POLITICAL ANALYST CRAIG JONES.
AND NOW WE NOW GO TO THE FIELD ONCE AGAIN WHERE JOSEPH JENSEN
>>THE ALIENS ARE ABOUT MAKE THEIR FIRST CONTACT.
>>LET'S GO NOW TO STEVE WITH SPORTS.
AND THANK YOU ALL FOR JOINING US TONIGHT.
STAY TUNED FOR FALLON AND BE SURE TO CHECK OUT
THE MORNING NEWS TEAM TOMORROW MORNING AT SIX.
YOU HAVE FOUR MORE MINUTES, SO JUST STRETCH IT OUT.
WASN'T IT FUNNY. IT WAS TOTALLY AWESOME.
NOW I AM DOING A 15 SEC SLATE
SO THAT YOU WILL CLICK SUBSCRIBE
OH. IT NEEDS TO BE LONGER. OKAY.

comments.text:
Well done Studio C, it's quite a story you hid in your video!

The world is in global unrest as gigantic dolphin robots have taken siege 
of the whole South American continent. Kurt is secretly a hill billy but he 
cannot tell his friends because they don't like pitchforks or eating straw 
in their spare time. Jason K. was discovered moonlighting as a super 
villain two nights ago on the streets of Provo, which is considered the 
most uneventful city in the world. Unfortunately, there were no super heros 
around to stop him from vandalizing the bowling clubs and soda shops.      
VERY IMPORTANT NOTICE!!!!!!!, YOUR VERY SURVIVAL DEPENDS ON THE MESSAGE 
IMMEDIATELY FOLLOWING THIS: Governor of Massachusetts just mandated all 
humans with the first name of "Steve" be donated to the state for 
questioning and for intense arm wrestling challenge. The winner buys 
dinner.  The infamous revolutionary Alycia G. has appeared on the coast of 
Utah Lake. She is armed with various sea life and shiny metals. If 
approached by this person, just turn around and start doing jumping jacks. 
It's good to be fit before you die.   Breaking News: Adam is really a 
transformer. He downloads his amazing animation and motion graphic 
knowledge from a top secret alien robot computer every tuesday nights at 
7:36 pm. Be on guard.   Stay in doors, an infestation of Spencer broodlings 
has been reported to have landed in Wyoming just a few hours ago.   Money 
still exists.   There is lots of money in all sorts of places.   Some 
people have more money than other people.   Oh, someone just got more 
money.   Nevermind it's gone now.   Swimming deemed unsafe for anyone in 
any circumstance. Any violators will be stunned on site.   Landon G. has 
recently successfully discovered a cure for the great Pokemon virus that 
has been spreading across the globe. It is love and larger Pokeballs. 
Little did we know, all those guys needed was a little more living space. 
The Monocles R U just peaked as the highest grossing business loan of 
history, never to be beat by any business that has ever existed in the 
lifetime of the Earth, at all. It is not likely that it will ever be beaten 
by anyone for as long as Earth is turning and time is continuing in a 
forward flow of endlessness. Co founder Christian H. says that he has the 
great invention of glass to thank for his extreme, unbeatable successes, 
but is Arch Nemesis Jerome Newsman has something else to say about the 
matter.﻿
